name: Si Shooter Project
description:
This is my Si Shooter Project, and I did some modification on it, Such as:

  1. - Level 3 (Increase the number of enemies to 10)
  2. - Add astroids to block the player movements and its hits.
  3. - The MainMenu Background + Game title Color.
  4. - The name of the game 
  5. - The size of the Camera.
  6. - In-game background
  7. - In-game sound (each level has its own sound)

Created by Sara AlSoghayer.
